message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $13,500 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet in the middle at $11,250?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $11,250 is still a bit high. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. This is my final offer, let me know what you think.
